sub_topic: Finding the shortest path between two nodes in a graph.
message_1:
A student needs to find the shortest path between node A and node F in the given graph below. Each edge has an associated weight. Find the total weight of the shortest path.

```
                4
        A ------------> B
        |  \           /  \
      2 |   \      5 /     \ 1
        |    \      /   2   \
        |  1   \  /          \
        C ------ D ----------> E
               3               2
```

What is the total weight of the shortest path between node A and node F?
message_2: There is no node F in the given graph. Please provide the correct node or update the graph.
